The claim originated from a post on the: made by a user named "John" who allegedly predicted the Las Vegas Strip mass shooting.
The post by: John" warned people to stay away from Las Vegas due to a coming deadly attack, mentioning a "high incident project" that was due to take place soon.
The messages posted by: John" did not provide specific details about the catastrophe but mentioned vaguely that some kind of incident would occur the following day in Las Vegas or Henderson, with a mention of "three black vans parked next to either."
There is a possibility that the post by: John" could have been a troll or an attempt to create fear, as it was made on the day before the 16th anniversary of the 9/11 terrorist attack.
